title: Ethereum Cat Herders Meeting #88
body:
## Date and Time

July 05, 2022, at 15:00 UTC

## Location 

Zoom: https://us02web.zoom.us/j/84834303064?pwd=YTVDNUxvSjEzL1VTOXNoNmI1a2RlZz09

Video at YouTube: https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCD9iiIwTRtLDYcEWONs2Q3A


## Agenda

New users on ECH Discord and/or contributor's introduction

### 1. Ethereum network upgrades
- [The Merge](https://ethereumcatherders.com/the_merge/)â€Š
- Sepolia Merge [Announcement](https://blog.ethereum.org/2022/06/30/sepolia-merge-announcement/), independent [blogpost](https://etherworld.co/2022/06/17/sepolia-testnet-merge/)
- [Shanghai specs](https://github.com/ethereum/execution-specs/blob/master/network-upgrades/mainnet-upgrades/shanghai.md), [Tracker](https://github.com/ethereum/execution-specs/projects/1)

### 2. New initiatives
- ECH GitHub backup & YouTube backup
- [2022 Ethereum Cat Herders website Contributor](https://www.gitpoap.io/gp/133)

### 3. Events & hackathon
- EF research team will host a [Reddit AMA](https://www.reddit.com/r/ethereum/comments/vrx9xe/ama_we_are_ef_research_pt_8_07_july_2022/) on Jul 7 at 1pm UTC
- [Eth CC 5](https://ethcc.io/) JULY 19-21, 2022
- [DEVCON VI: Applications Online, Participation Details Inside ](https://blog.ethereum.org/2022/06/06/devcon-vi-details/) 

### 4. ECH updates
- [ECH website](https://www.ethereumcatherders.com/)
- [ECH engineering](https://github.com/ethereum-cat-herders/PM/issues/266) 
  - Need Ruby dev
  - [EIP bot](https://github.com/ethereum/EIP-Bot/issues) & [EIPV](https://github.com/ethereum/eipv/issues)
  - [Learn2Earn](https://github.com/ethereum-cat-herders/L2E)
- Cat blazers 
   - [ECH Podcast](https://open.spotify.com/show/7dgxKMkSyy3HWtQW7OfqXA)
- ECH Operations 
   - All Wallet Devs meeting [Recording](https://youtu.be/0fMUrgdgI_g)
- [EIP Insight](https://hackmd.io/@poojaranjan/EthereumImprovementProposalsInsight)
- [PEEPanEIP](https://www.youtube.com/playlist?list=PL4cwHXAawZxqu0PKKyMzG_3BJV_xZTi1F)  
    - Upcoming meetings can be found on [PEEPanEIP schedule](https://github.com/ethereum-cat-herders/PM/projects/2)

- [Meeting notes](https://docs.google.com/spreadsheets/d/1axM1KaKc-GCcoPbAnYTOhgLnxXsBVoO5XRjTN3CLnck/edit#gid=0) and action items for ECH 
  - All Core Dev meeting [notes 141](https://github.com/ethereum/pm/pull/567)
  - Consensus meeting notes 90
  - EIP Improvement Process [meeting 59](https://github.com/ethereum-cat-herders/EIPIP/pull/155)
    - Executable Spec instead of Core EIPs Ref [working doc](https://notes.ethereum.org/@timbeiko/executable-eips)
    - One-time NFT Sale of unused EIP numbers  Ref: [here](https://github.com/ethereum/EIPs/issues/5082)

**Other community meetings**
  - [URL/URI standard working group](https://hackmd.io/@poojaranjan/URLWorkingGroup), meeting 4 [Agenda](https://github.com/ethereum-cat-herders/EIPIP/issues/149)
  - EIP editors apprentice meeting 20 [Recording](https://youtu.be/7PBvQREwqQ8)
  - KZG-Ceremony Breakout Call # 2 [Recording](https://youtu.be/h2J6c95wk9k)

### 5. Review of outstanding action items from previous ECH meetings
- [Meeting 87](https://github.com/ethereum-cat-herders/PM/blob/master/All%20Ethereum%20Cat%20Herder%20Meetings/Meeting%20087.md)

 Anything else?

#### The date for the next meeting - July 19, 2022.

As mentioned in the call - 
Emergency Guidelines for Protocols & Dapps
https://twitter.com/suprgupta/status/1534936511757848576
